name: Emanuela Fachini
content: Emanuela Fachini Home page Department of Computer Science Emanuela Fachini I used to work on abstract complexity, models of systolic computations, formal languages and automata theory. More recently my research interests are in Combinatorics. Selected Publications Teaching Contact Emanuela Fachini is a Professor of the Computer Science Department at the University of Rome "Sapienza" since 1997. She received her degree in Mathematics in 1975. From 1976 to 1984 she was a research associate in the "Dipartimento di Informatica e Applicazioni" of the University of Salerno, where she became Full Professor in 1987. In 1990 she moved to the "Dipartimento di Informatica, Sistemi e Produzione" of the University of Rome 'Tor Vergata'.
